talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
His Majesty has an urgent decree for you.
Go and have an audience with him now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Accept Quest)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Signs of Anomaly$</html>

$Duke Stewart$
What a sluggard!
Seeking an audience with His Majesty is the first thing you should do after arriving here!
Mindless fool who knows no manners…

$Velskud$
I didn’t summon you here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I came here as soon as I heard you were looking for me.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
I... I summoned you here.
W-what m-m-made you come so late?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>May I know what you’re referring to?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
Is that s-so?
There’s s-something urgent I must t-t-tell you.
Have you seen what’s happening outside the p-p-palace?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh… that…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
H-have you not seen...?
The… Garden of Time and Space has become w-weird...
I s-summoned you here because I heard you were a capable talent... but how come you know n-nothing?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I can’t tell him about Mistland…)</FONT> There seems to be an issue with the management of the Garden.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
Yes! I knew you could answer m-my questions.
Tell me what is h-happening.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you trying to say I can check with Duke Stewart?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
I’m w-worried that my p-p-people would feel uneasy about the phenomenon.
Will the city be all right?
I order you to... Erm…
Well... I need you to… Do something but what I want is... Erm…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>As you wish, your Majesty. <FONT color=#7e12d2>(Phew, it looks like the young king still can’t decide on his own.)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$King Cassius$
R-right.
That’s what I was about to s-say.
I’ve let uncle know so go and d-d-do what you need to d-do.

$King Cassius$
Uncle said the royal castle will be f-f-fine.
I’m sure it will... Ehem.

$Velskud$
Here comes the irritating kid again.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>He told me to ask you for the details.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
So did you get the royal decree issued by His Majesty?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Me?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
I guess he sent you to me because of his immense trust in me.
His Majesty is worried about the ominous incidents happening in the Garden of Time and Space.
I hope this does not further add anxiety to his weak heart…
I want you to take this task with great responsibility.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Continue)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
You know, there’s no one he can trust in this palace.
Of course, except for me, his kin.
It’s hard for me to leave His Majesty here all alone so I want you to do this job.
(Cassius keeps glancing in your direction.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Erm... Well…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
You heard me. Now quickly go and investigate what is going on and find a solution for the issue.
If you carry out this task well, you will become his highly trusted subject.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#7e12d2>(I was supposed to investigate it even without his orders anyway…)</FONT> I was overwhelmed by gratitude for your kindness…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
What are you waiting for? Receive the royal decree with formalities!
You’re really a dimwit with no manners……
I don’t know if we can trust someone like you.
This is a rare opportunity that we’re giving you because we think you’re the best candidate!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes sir.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stewart$
Oh is that so? I guess I was rash in judging you.
I want to lessen His Majesty’s anxiety as soon as possible so do hurry.

$Duke Stewart$
Ashes on the statue of the Goddess seem so ominous……

$King Cassius$
Did uncle tell you what to do?
I hope you understand what you need to do now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What happened? The <FONT color=#a82424>Garden of Time and Space</FONT> is……</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What is it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But this is… </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Don’t make a fuss.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did you already know what happened to the <FONT color=#a82424>Goddess Statue</FONT>? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Keep quiet if you’re not here to stir up trouble.
I already know what’s going on even if you don’t make a fuss about it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>They already know about it.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I don’t have time to care about such things.
But if this goes on, I guess the people in Royal Castle will soon poke their noses in this matter too.
Irritating humans…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes, I was summoned to the Royal Castle just now.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Hah, humans…
They can’t do anything on their own and they will shamelessly demand a solution,
shouting, “Solve this problem now!”

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Useless fool? That’s too much, Velskud…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
What? You?
Hah! Now humans are seeking help from useless fools too.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Anyway, what’s happening? It’s even worse than before.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Maybe it’s a good thing that you were given this task.
I would have had to explain everything from the beginning if they sent another person.
That’s a relief.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Did this happen because of the <FONT color=#a82424>Labyrinth</FONT>?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I wonder if the dragon kid is doing his work at all after going to Mistland. Nothing has changed.
I managed to find clues on the woman in black robe but she disappeared and the situation has come to this state.
I feel ashamed.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I’m afraid the Nests might go <FONT color=#a82424>out of control</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
That’s right.
Labyrinth’s influence has made it harder to keep Nests in the Garden.
Thanks to that, the Garden of Time and Space has turned into this catastrophe.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I don’t know why but the Garden of Time and Space feels <FONT color=#a82424>empty</FONT>. Like it’s nothing but an empty shell…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Why is a human like you worried about such things?
……
But... I guess the situation does call for attention. Have you noticed?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>That means Nests cannot continue to be kept here?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Not bad, kid. You’re right.
Now this place is nothing but an empty shell.
Nests are no longer bound here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You told me last time that there were cases when <FONT color=#a82424>connection with Nests were lost</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I hate to admit it, but that’s the current situation.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Then what do we do now? There’s no hope?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Yes. I never thought that those were the early warning signs…
I tried to reconnect the Nests several times but I always failed.
It’s probably because of the Labyrinth.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But you said Nests cannot be connected anymore. Then how do I check them?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I will find a way and you don’t have to worry about that.
Do you think I’ll let the Garden of Time and Space crumble like this? No way.
There’s something I need to do so you go and check the Nests.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Oh, right! The Nests must be at the <FONT color=#a82424>places where they first occurred</FONT>.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Since the Nests that were connected here are gone, they must have reappeared at their original locations.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But I don’t remember where I found them first…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Stop pestering me and go if you’ve understood.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you going to investigate?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
Sigh... Useless kid.
Stop bothering me and ask Madeleine if you have any other questions.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html><FONT color=#387206>(Receive Rewards)</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>$Quest Completed$</html>

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay. (Is he mad at me?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Velskud$
I said ask Madeleine if you have any questions.
It looks like you have forgotten your place after being praised by so many people. Don’t bother me anymore.

$Duke Stewart$
What are you still doing here?
Go and work for the kingdom and His Majesty.

$King Cassius$
You must be working hard for your king.

journal.title: Anxious King
journal.contents:
King Cassius has an order for you. Go to Royal Castle to meet King Cassius.

Saint Haven - King Cassius (Royal Castle)

journal.title: Ominous Energy
journal.contents:
Talk to Duke Stewart to find out what King Cassius wanted to say.

Saint Haven - Duke Stewart (Royal Castle)

journal.title: What’s Happening
journal.contents:
Talk to Velskud to find out what is going on at the Garden of Time and Space.

Garden of Time and Space - Velskud
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Velskud at the Garden of Time and Space.
